mean_en: a group of words or a short piece of writing taken from a book, play, speech, etc. and repeated because it is interesting or useful; the act of repeating something interesting or useful that another person has written or said
sentence: I like to read quotations from funny and famous people.
sentence_trans: 我喜欢读一些搞笑的人和名人的语录。
word_etyma: quot=quote引用 + ation表行为 → 引文，引语
